2025.title: Xcode AI Assistant debuts
2025.description: WWDC 2025 introduced Apple's generative coding assistant for Xcode 15, offering auto-complete, refactoring, and Swift suggestions.

2025.title: Liquid Glass UI unveiled
2025.description: Apple launched its Liquid Glass design language for iOS 19, enhancing depth, animation, and fluidity across iPhone, iPad, and VisionOS.

2025.title: Spatial apps and ARKit 7
2025.description: With the rise of Apple Vision Pro, ARKit 7 allowed developers to create immersive spatial apps combining hand tracking and scene understanding.
